name: Arch Drift
description:
This little game is made by 4 students in their final year of highschool as an economics project.
So if the game is a bit buggy and doesn't feel really complete, we aren't really experienced but we will update this game.Features
  • Randomly generated rooms
  • Multiple items to use
  • 5 paths to new mysteries
  • 2 playable characters (more will follow)
  • Different bosses (more will follow)
  • Different enemies (more will follow)
  • secrets...
